headline.main: Letters to the Editor; On the Mark Twain School Decision

docs.abstract: Helen Sachs Straus lr holds crime in NYC would be reduced if streets were kept clean
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Federal Judge Jack B. Weinstein's ruling on the racial imbalance at Mark Twain Junior High School and its environs in Coney Island may stir objections from some factions in this seashore community, but in the long run the proposed integration will greatly improve conditions and become welcomed by all responsible residents.
